events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the Refund category based on the customer's request.
The case has been assigned to the refund processing team for further handling.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I'll be happy to assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item I received instead.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund for your order within 3-5 business days and arrange for the return shipping at no cost to you.
That sounds great, thank you for handling this quickly. I appreciate the clear instructions on returning the item.
Your refund has been initiated and you should see the amount credited to your original payment method soon.
We are checking in to ensure your refund was received successfully and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been finalized and no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
